post.author: 이진경
post.content:
North America's fastest growing Income Tax Company requires a C++ developer to integrate an off the shelf program with our proprietary software.

The ideal candidate will have 2-3 years of experience in C++. In addition, our candidate should have Microsoft Foundation Class (MFC) experience, which often goes hand-in-hand with C++ work.


Additional Information
Salary: CAD 40,000.00 to CAD 60,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
donald.robertson@libtax.com
Liberty Tax Service
3300 Bloor Street West
Etobicoke ON M8X 2J7
post.title: C++ developer
